entries.femaleVariant: WNS News has been notified of a breaking story. Saburo Arasaka lives once more, though now in the body of his son.
The CEO was reported dead months ago, but now it's been revealed that a copy of his consciousness was made before his death.
It appears his consciousness was used to overwrite that of his son and heir, Yorinobu Arasaka. This shocking development was revealed at a press conference earlier today.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="皆さん、いらっしゃい" t="Welcome, everyone." b="" a=""/>
Today is truly a historic day. Today, technology has fulfilled the promise left empty by religion.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="祖父はよく、「枯れ落ちた花は枝に戻らない」と言っていました" t="My grandfather once told me, \"A fallen flower cannot return to its branch.\" " b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="人は誰も、物心ついた瞬間から、死を恐れるものです" t="From the moment a person becomes conscious of their being, they live in fear of death." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="ついに、人類最大の恐怖が克服されました。私、サブロウ・アラサカは今、息子の体を使い、みなさんの前に立っています" t="Mankind's oldest and greatest fear has been overcome. Here before you, I stand now – Saburo Arasaka – alive in the body of my son." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="私はかつてヨリノブに生を与えました。彼は愛する父のために、それを返してくれたのです" t="I once gave life to my Yorinobu. In return, he has demonstrated the depth of a son's love and has returned this gift to me." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="私のいない間、ヨリノブは会社を変革しようといくつかの決定を下しましたが、これらは過ちでした" t="In my absence, Yorinobu made several decisions aimed at transforming our company. In these, he erred." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="私の指揮のもと、アラサカ社は元の姿を取り戻します。決して揺らぐことのない、強いアラサカが帰ってくることを、約束いたします。" t="Under my leadership, the Arasaka Corporation will return to its roots – roots strong enough to move the heaviest stones." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="ご清聴ありがとうございました" t="Thank you." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="サブロウ様、誠におめでとうございます" t="Thank you, Saburo. You are an inspiration." b="" a=""/>
